Hero.title: Seb & Laura Are Getting Married!
Hero.description: We are thrilled to invite you to share in our joy as we take the next step in our journey together. This website is designed to provide you with all the information you need about our special day. You'll find details about the venue, schedule, accommodations, and more.

When.title: When
When.description: We are getting married on <bold>{date}</bold>. You can arrive from <bold>{timeArrival}</bold> and the ceremony will start at <bold>{timeCeremony}</bold>
When.accommodation: There is accommodation onsite (details below) so if you expect to stay we suggest securing your availability for the <bold>7th and 8th</bold>.

ThemeFood.title: Theme & Food
ThemeFood.theme: Be Your Own Weird (Because we are weird and so are you)
ThemeFood.clothing: We want you to be comfortable, so wear what you want, be who you are, you can come all dressed up, or a little more casual, or maybe a little fantastical!
ThemeFood.food: We are having a party, so be prepared to dance, drink, and eat. There will be a BBQ, with vegan and vegetarian options, so there is something for everyone. Just let us know any preferences when you <link>RSVP below</link>.

Gallery.title: Almost Ten Years of Growing, Drinking, & Loving
Gallery.subtitle: Apparently we mostly take selfies when we are drinking or abroad, that seems about right, we have had many adventures over the last decade.

Message.title: We are looking forward to seeing you on the day!
Message.body: We will have a live band throughout the day, there is a private bar and drink on arrival, there will be no legal bit, so you can object all you like, it's still happening.

Gifts.title: What
Gifts.poem1:
To avoid your gifts being regifted or stashed
We could really make use of some money or cash
Gifts.poem2:
Towards our honeymoon, a car, a house, who knows
Your generosity in our memory will eternally glow
Gifts.poem3:
But please don't think of this is as a fee
Your presence, not presents bring us glee
Gifts.dogsNote: As much as we would love to invite everyone's children, this is an adult only event. Please note this event is for our own dogs only.
